>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/admin/law-firms/{lawFirmId}/users/{userId}/capabilities"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Convenience aggregator for SPA. Returns:
- scopes: the effective scopes for the user in this firm context,
- resources: field-level policies per resource/action,
- caseIds: arrays for view/edit/admin sets.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"lawFirmId","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"in":"path","name":"userId","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"in":"query","name":"include","description":"Optional CSV to control included sections (scopes,resources,caseIds). Defaults to all.","schema":{"type":"string","example":"scopes,resources,caseIds"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Aggregate of scopes + resource field policies + selected resource id grants.","properties":{"scopes":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"resources":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":{"type":"object","description":"Actions for a given resource code (e.g., CASE, INVOICE)","additionalProperties":{"type":"object","properties":{"fieldMode":{"type":"string","enum":["ALL","ONLY","EXCEPT"]},"fields":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}},"required":["fieldMode"],"title":"ResourceActionPolicy"}}},"caseIds":{"type":"object","properties":{"view":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"integer"}},"edit":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"integer"}},"admin":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"integer"}}}}},"example":{"scopes":["cases:read","cases:write","invoices:read"],"resources":{"CASE":{"read":{"fieldMode":"ALL"},"update":{"fieldMode":"EXCEPT","fields":["budget.*","settlement_terms"]}}},"caseIds":{"view":[101,102,123],"edit":[101,123],"admin":[123]}},"title":"CapabilitiesResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
